profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

profile: ROYAL Decks Co. is a custom decking company priding itself in high quality of work and complete customer satisfaction. ROYAL Decks Co. focuses on specialty materials, such as exotic hardwoods, low maintenance materials and high grades of cedar. ROYAL Decks Co. offers a complete solution for a homeowner from custom designs to the execution of the project. ROYAL Decks Co. was founded in Burlington Ontario and quickly grew to serve all surrounding areas of Toronto and also Calgary since 2008 onwards. We are successful because we take every deck builder project as if it was the only one, although we build hundreds each year. Our success is based on the following five core values: Great design Quality work Build on time and budget Provide great warranty Safety Great design In order for the deck to be great, it has to be usable, look great and fulfill all of the customer's expectations. With our extensive experience, we will work with you to design the deck that will serve the purpose, according to your needs. This means getting the right size and shape of the deck, getting the right features and selecting the right materials. We work with many materials of different properties and we are sure to find one that will work for you. Build quality We have only the most experienced carpenters. Our carpenters have been in construction most of their lives and they build decks not because they have to, but because they love it. All of our decks have to meet very strict ROYAL Decks Co. quality control on top of any building code requirements. Our decks not only meet building code, they exceed it. Build on time and on budget Our estimate includes time frame when the project will be started, how long it will take and how much exactly it will cost. We strive to make the construction process an enjoyable experience. That is why we take these extra seriously. Provide great warranty We are proud to give one of the best warranties in the business to every deck that carries ROYAL Decks Co. name on it. We stand behind the work that we do. To see details about our warranty please visit our warranty website. Safety Safety is our utter most requirement doing any work. We carry both WCB and WSIB, to date without a single claim. We keep our workplace neat and organized to minimize any injuries. Sincerely, Miro

profile:
Welcome to Craft-Bilt Materials Ltd
We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. For 17 years we operated from the old Wrisco location, a 32,000 square foot facility in the Toronto suburb of Markham. In February of 2009, we moved to our current custom designed, 40,000 square foot facility in Ajax, Ontario (just East of Toronto).

Craft-Bilt’s main business is contractor sales of sunrooms, railing, waterproof decking, awnings and patio covers. We manufacture railing kits, canopy kits and sunroom kits. Our line of retractable fabric shades includes: fabric awnings, motorized screens, free standing canopies and canopies for pergolas.

We take a great deal of pride in the engineering behind our products. Proper engineering is important for obtaining building permits. You will find that Craft-Bilt products exceed the industry standard.

Our sales are primarily to customers in Canada. If you are interested in sunrooms or shade products in the USA, please contact Craft-Bilt Manufacturing Co. in Pennsylvania. They have been producing sunrooms in the United States for over 40 years.

Proven to be one of the top home renovation companies in Hamilton, Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. Our clients come first in all that we do, so you can count on us to be there every step of the way, whether it’s giving you an update at the end of every day or honouring or maintaining a clean workspace.

Whether you are looking for upscale complete home renovations, a one of a kind custom built home, or perhaps a room specific renovation such as a kitchen, basement, bathroom & ensuite or custom cabinetry and millwork built-ins; Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. offers a full range of services to suit your needs.

No Hidden Costs

Quality Workmanship
Our quality workmanship can be seen throughout Ontario. We have completed many custom building projects for our clients throughout Hamilton, Stoney Creek, Burlington, Oakville, Binbrook, Grismby and Niagara Region. We are committed to excellence, our Customer Satisfaction Is Our Standard.

RENOVATIONS

Home Renovations, Additions And New Builds Done Right. Every Time.
We at Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. specialize in renovations and provide quality workmanship with competitive pricing!

BATHROOM

We provide the skill and craftsmanship you need to create the bathroom you’ve been dreaming about.
We are bathroom renovation specialists in Hamilton Area and provide the craftsmanship and planning so you get what you want.

Custom Vanities

Custom Tile and Stone
Radiant Floor Heating

BASEMENTS

Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. Hamilton’s Premier Basement Renovation Company.
Milanos All-star Construction Inc. is top basement renovation contractors in Hamilton, we consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. Our passion for building new custom basement projects drives us, reflecting who we are as a company and what we do for our clients. Whether your goal is to have extra space for your family, a comfortable office to work from home or just a place to relax, the possibilities are endless. As basement experts, we take this seriously. Our team is creative, efficient and meticulous.


OPEN CONCEPT STRUCTURAL DESIGN

Looking for a Open Concept Design?

Our team removes the guesswork that is typical among home building and renovations. Beyond the aesthetics, our approach to designs ensures highly accurate estimates and clarity of the results before the project begins.
From new builds to renovations, we will manage all the details throughout every stage of the project. We will keep you updated with the progress and ensure the site remains clean and secure.



FRAMING

Need a skilled carpenter to finish your home projects?
We have the skill and experience you’ve been looking for. We tackle all-size projects from an entire house to a single doorway.


PAINTING

Hamilton Painters that get job done Right!

Our Painting is done by experts who know what it takes to deliver excellent results. We do not subcontract our painting projects, which means consistent results and service every time.


FENCES

If you need to build a fence, we can get the job done. Wood or composite anything is possible.
Whether you need commercial fencing, residential fencing, automated gates or a high quality, affordable access control system we have what you need.
We have years of experience in woodworking, we take pride in our work & love what we do.


DECKS

Nothing is too big or too small, from terraced decks to a small porch out front. We can tackle any type of deck project you may have.


LANDSCAPING

Landscapes big and small, we offer value-packed outdoor enhancements.
Our goal is to ensure you are satisfied with the results we provide – that’s why our landscaping services are diverse and flexible. We can customize your landscape design and construct your outdoor yard to how you desire it to be. Our landscaping serves in Hamilton, and surrounding areas! Schedule a meeting with our landscape designer today.
We specialize in one of a kind outdoor living spaces with a focus on superior craftsmanship and personally ensuring our clients satisfaction.
